Notes.Text:
This update for libwebp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-4863: Fixed heap buffer overflow (bsc#1215231).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Heap buffer overflow in libwebp in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.187 and libwebp 1.3.2 allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Critical)
